price: Kami tidak pernah mendengar hal ini dalam agama yang terakhir 1298; ini (mengesakan Allah) tidak lain hanyalah (dusta) yang diada-adakan,
arabic: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ
footnotes: 1298.  Maksudnya "agama yang terakhir" oleh orang-orang kafir Quraisy ialah agama Nasrani yang menigakan Tuhan.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā samiʿ'nā bihādhā fī al-milati al-ākhirati in hādhā illā ikh'tilāqun
